bug.author: saidbleik
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
importing utils_nlp returns the following error: <denchmark-code>File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module> File "/media/bleik2/nlp/utils_nlp/__init__.py", line 5, in <module> __version__ = get_version() File "/media/bleik2/miniconda3/envs/nlp_gpu/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools_scm/__init__.py", line 150, in get_version parsed_version = _do_parse(config) File "/media/bleik2/miniconda3/envs/nlp_gpu/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools_scm/__init__.py", line 113, in _do_parse "use git+https://github.com/user/proj.git#egg=proj" % config.absolute_root LookupError: setuptools-scm was unable to detect version for '/media/bleik2/nlp/examples/text_classification'. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
generate yml file and create nlp_gpu env call import utils_nlp in Python terminal <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/saidbleik>@saidbleik</denchmark-link> closing this as fix is merged.
